# HANNEST - PROJECT RULES & GUIDELINES

## 1. PROJECT OVERVIEW
Hayvan yemi üretim ve satış firması için kurumsal web sitesi. Modern, özgün tasarım ve modüler mimari ile geliştirilecek.

## 2. DESIGN PRINCIPLES

### 2.1 Color Palette
- **ZORUNLU**: Sektörde yaygın kullanılan yeşil-turuncu-sarı paletinden UZAK DURUN
- **Ana Renkler**: Koyu tonlar (deep navy, charcoal, dark teal, burgundy)
- **Vurgu Renkleri**: Premium metalik tonlar (bronze, dark gold, platinum)
- **Örnek Palet**: `#1a1f2e` (background), `#2d3748` (secondary), `#c27c47` (accent), `#e8d4b8` (light)

### 2.2 Visual Identity
- Minimalist ve modern yaklaşım, tarımsal klişelerden kaçının
- Premium glassmorphism ve gradient efektleri
- Micro-animations (hover, scroll triggers)
- Custom iconography (generic icon setleri kullanmayın)
- Typography: Google Fonts - Montserrat (headings), Inter (body)

### 2.3 UI/UX Standards
- Mobile-first responsive design
- Maksimum 3 tık ile her sayfaya erişim
- Loading states tüm async işlemler için zorunlu
- Accessibility: WCAG 2.1 AA uyumluluğu
- Dark mode default (light mode opsiyonel)

## 3. TECHNICAL ARCHITECTURE

### 3.1 Backend (PHP)
- **Version**: PHP 8.2+
- **Structure**: MVC pattern zorunlu
- **Autoloading**: PSR-4 standard
- **Namespaces**: `Hannest\Module\SubModule`
- **Error Handling**: Try-catch blokları, custom exception classes
- **Security**: Prepared statements, input validation, CSRF tokens, XSS prevention

### 3.2 Database (Supabase)
- **Authentication**: Supabase Auth için wrapper class
- **RLS Policies**: Tüm tablolar için row-level security
- **Migrations**: Timestamp'li migration dosyaları (`YYYYMMDDHHMMSS_description.sql`)
- **Naming**: snake_case (tablolar: `product_categories`, kolonlar: `created_at`)
- **Indexing**: Foreign keys, slug, language ve JSONB kolonları (GIN index) için index
- **Performance**:
    - N+1 sorgulardan kaçının. İlişkili verileri tek sorguda çekmek için Supabase join (`table!inner(...)`) kullanın.
    - `select` içinde filtreleme yaparken join tablosunu filtreye dahil edin (`relation.column` => `value`).

### 3.3 File Structure
```
/
├── config/                 # Konfigürasyon dosyaları
├── src/
│   ├── Controllers/        # Request handlers
│   ├── Models/            # Data layer
│   ├── Services/          # Business logic
│   ├── Middleware/        # Request middleware
│   └── Helpers/           # Utility functions
├── public/                # Web root
│   ├── assets/
│   │   ├── css/          # Compiled CSS
│   │   ├── js/           # JavaScript modules
│   │   └── images/       # Optimized images (WebP)
│   └── index.php         # Entry point
├── views/                 # Template files
│   ├── layouts/          # Master templates
│   ├── components/       # Reusable UI components
│   └── pages/            # Page templates
├── lang/                  # Language files
├── database/
│   └── migrations/       # SQL migration files
└── tests/                # Unit/Integration tests
```

### 3.4 Modularity Rules
- Her modül bağımsız çalışabilmeli (dependency injection)
- Interface-based programming (örn: `DatabaseInterface`, `CacheInterface`)
- Single Responsibility Principle - her class tek bir işten sorumlu
- Config dosyaları environment-based (`.env` kullanımı)

## 4. CODE STANDARDS

### 4.1 File Headers (ZORUNLU)
Her dosyanın başında:
```php
<?php
/**
 * File: CategoryController.php
 * Purpose: Ürün kategorilerinin CRUD işlemlerini yönetir
 * Dependencies: BaseController, CategoryService, ValidationHelper
 * Author: [İsim]
 * Created: 2026-01-15
 */
```

### 4.2 Naming Conventions
- **Classes**: PascalCase (`ProductController`)
- **Methods**: camelCase (`getProductById()`)
- **Variables**: camelCase (`$productList`)
- **Constants**: UPPER_SNAKE_CASE (`MAX_UPLOAD_SIZE`)
- **Database**: snake_case (`product_id`)
- **Files**: PascalCase for classes, lowercase for configs

### 4.3 Documentation
- PHPDoc blokları tüm public methods için zorunlu
- Complex logic için inline comments (Türkçe)
- README.md her major klasörde (purpose, usage)

### 4.4 Security Checklist
- [ ] Input sanitization (htmlspecialchars, filter_var)
- [ ] SQL injection prevention (prepared statements)
- [ ] XSS protection (CSP headers)
- [ ] CSRF tokens tüm formlarda
- [ ] Rate limiting (API endpoints)
- [ ] Secure session management
- [ ] Password hashing (bcrypt/argon2)
- [ ] File upload validation (type, size, content)

## 5. LANGUAGE SYSTEM

### 5.1 Structure
```
lang/
├── tr/
│   ├── common.php      # Genel terimler (Kaydet, İptal, vb)
│   ├── products.php    # Ürün modülü
│   └── errors.php      # Hata mesajları
└── en/                 # Gelecek için hazır
```

### 5.2 Usage
```php
// Helper function
// Helper function
function __($key) {
    // app/lang/tr/products.php => 'title' => 'Ürünler'
    // Usage:
    return __('products.title'); 
}
```

### 5.3 Rules
- Hardcoded metinler yasak, her metin lang dosyasından
- Placeholder syntax: `{variable_name}`
- Fallback mechanism: TR yoksa EN, EN yoksa key'i göster

## 6. SEO & PERFORMANCE

### 6.1 URL Structure
```
✓ /urunlerimiz/tavuk-yemi
✓ /hakkimizda/kalite-politikamiz  
✗ /page.php?id=123
✗ /index.php?cat=feed&sub=chicken
```

### 6.2 SEO Requirements
- Meta tags: title (55-60 char), description (150-160 char)
- Open Graph tags (Facebook/LinkedIn share)
- Schema.org markup (Organization, Product, BreadcrumbList)
- XML sitemap auto-generation
- Robots.txt configuration
- Canonical URLs
- Alt texts tüm görseller için
- Semantic HTML5 (article, section, nav, aside)

### 6.3 Performance
- **Images**: WebP format, lazy loading, responsive srcset
- **CSS/JS**: Minify, combine, async/defer loading
- **Caching**: Redis/Memcached for database queries
- **CDN**: Static assets için
- **Gzip**: Text-based files compression
- **Target**: PageSpeed score 90+, LCP < 2.5s

## 7. COMPONENT ARCHITECTURE

### 7.1 Reusable Components
```php
// views/components/ProductCard.php
/**
 * Component: ProductCard
 * Props: $title, $image, $price, $url
 */
```

### 7.2 Component Rules
- Self-contained (own styles via CSS modules)
- Props validation
- Default values for optional props
- No business logic (sadece presentation)

## 8. TESTING STRATEGY

### 8.1 Required Tests
- Unit tests: Models, Services, Helpers
- Integration tests: Database operations
- E2E tests: Critical user flows (ürün listeleme, iletişim formu)

### 8.2 Tools
- PHPUnit for unit/integration
- Selenium/Cypress for E2E
- Code coverage target: 70%+

## 9. VERSION CONTROL

### 9.1 Git Workflow
- Branch naming: `feature/product-catalog`, `bugfix/login-error`, `hotfix/security-patch`
- Commit messages: `[MODULE] Action: Description` 
  - Örn: `[Products] Add: Category filtering functionality`
- Never commit: `.env`, `vendor/`, `node_modules/`, sensitive data

### 9.2 Code Review
- Minimum 1 review before merge
- Checklist: functionality, security, performance, code style

## 10. DEPLOYMENT

### 10.1 Environments
- **Development**: Local with Supabase local instance
- **Staging**: Cloud preview (test data)
- **Production**: Optimized build, real data

### 10.2 Pre-deployment Checklist
- [ ] All tests passing
- [ ] Security scan completed
- [ ] Performance audit done
- [ ] Database migrations tested
- [ ] Backup created
- [ ] Environment variables configured
- [ ] Error logging configured

## 11. ADDITIONAL BEST PRACTICES

### 11.1 Error Handling
- User-friendly error mesajları (lang dosyasından)
- Detailed errors sadece development'ta
- Error logging (Supabase logs veya Sentry)
- Graceful degradation (API down olsa bile site çalışmalı)

### 11.2 Forms
- Client-side ve server-side validation (double-check)
- AJAX submissions (UX için)
- Loading states ve success/error feedback
- Honeypot fields (bot protection)

### 11.3 API Design (Future)
- RESTful conventions
- Versioning: `/api/v1/products`
- Rate limiting
- API key authentication
- JSON responses (consistent structure)

### 11.4 Analytics & Monitoring
- Google Analytics 4 integration
- User behavior tracking (scroll depth, click maps)
- Performance monitoring (Core Web Vitals)
- Error tracking ve alerting

## 12. MAINTENANCE

### 12.1 Documentation Updates
- Code changes = Documentation updates (zorunlu)
- Monthly dependency updates check
- Quarterly security audit

### 12.2 Backup Strategy
- Daily database backups (Supabase automatic)
- Weekly full site backup (code + uploads)
- Retention: 30 days rolling

## 13. CRITICAL DONTS

❌ jQuery kullanımı (Vanilla JS veya modern framework)
❌ Inline styles (CSS sınıfları kullan)
❌ Magic numbers (Constants tanımla)
❌ Global variables (Scope kontrolü)
❌ Direct database queries in views (Model layer kullan)
❌ Copy-paste code (DRY principle)
❌ Ignoring errors (Her error handle edilmeli)
❌ Committing sensitive data
❌ Skipping code reviews

## 14. PROJECT PHASES

### Phase 1 - Foundation (Week 1-2)
- Project setup, database schema, core architecture
- Authentication system, language system
- Base components (header, footer, navigation)

### Phase 2 - Core Features (Week 3-4)
- Product catalog, kategoriler
- CMS (content management)
- Contact forms, iletişim sistemi

### Phase 3 - Enhancement (Week 5-6)
- SEO optimization
- Performance tuning
- Admin panel

### Phase 4 - Testing & Launch (Week 7-8)
- Full testing coverage
- Security audit
- Deployment, monitoring setup
